game.name: My Dream Hospital
game.description:
You have recently opened up your healthcare facility in the city. A team of highly experienced and knowledgeable doctors, surgeons and nurses have already joined you. Suddenly a girl with several health issues come to your medical facility. You have taken her to the operation theatre where all the needful medical equipment exists already since she is your patient so you do want to take a chance. Join My Dream Hospital and be prepared to start your medical career today in the best manner possible!

It looks that it the first emergency task you are going to handle in this HTML5 doctor game. This cute little girl has multiple severe injuries all over her body. Shift her to the trauma room first and begin having a keen look at her overall health! Check out her temperature and then use some ice bags over all the swollen bumps! Make sure to give the injured girl needful syrup and listen to her heartbeat. Try to take care of all the injuries timely before they get worse in this best emergency doctor simulator!

After completing her surgery, do not forget to give your patient a healthy fruit drink so that her body can get some natural vitamins timely. Once it is done, get ready to focus on your new patient. Complete the surgery on time and help your patients to get back to their normal health fast in this girls surgery game! Keep diagnosing all patients carefully and providing them with the best surgery in our more popular titles from the category of free hospital games!
